short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A relaxing game of tetris with a slight twist

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Simple block building game. Complete rows to remove them from the board. Pieces can be moved from one side to the other through the "out of bounds" on either side of the playing field.
Experiment with creating split blocks that can be used on both side of the board. Create your own strategies and beat the high score!

Arrow Keys Left, Right, and Down move the blocks, while the Up Arrow Key rotates them.
